content:
Name Crit Effect Type
My Teef! The target must succeed at a Dc 5 flat check to cast spells with the verbal component until healed. Bludgeoning
Gusher The target takes 1d6 persistent bleed damage. Piercing
Terrible Cut Triple damage. Slashing
Excruciating The target is sicked 3. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #43
